general: Today, dear Cancer, new layers of your relationships are being revealed. With the union of Mercury and Venus in your solar house of intimate relationships, your conversations can deepen. This is an opportunity to evolve beyond past wounds and create stronger bonds by showing compassion and openness. The Moon in Gemini, coupled with Chiron, strengthens your determination to reach higher levels of success, helping you overcome self-doubt. By asserting your authority, you can move forward, even if not everyone will celebrate your successes. Take the time to appreciate all facets of yourself when the Moon enters your sign later in the day.
love: Be open to deep conversations with your partner.
work: Assert yourself and do not let doubt hold you back.
health: Take a moment to meditate and re-center yourself.
advice: Open your heart and listen to your intuition.
